metadata.title: golang: net/http/internal: Denial of Service (DoS) via Resource Consumption via HTTP requests (important)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in the Golang net/http/internal package. This issue may allow a malicious user to send an HTTP request and cause the receiver to read more bytes from network than are in the body (up to 1GiB), causing the receiver to fail reading the response, possibly leading to a Denial of Service (DoS). 
            
            MITIGATION: No mitigation is available for this flaw.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
yggdrasil-worker-forwarder is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
